metadata.Title: CVE-2023-20897 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: Salt masters prior to 3005.2 or 3006.2 contain a DOS in minion return.After receiving several bad packets on the request server equal to thenumber of worker threads, the master will become unresponsive to returnrequests until restarted.

criterions.comment: salt: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
